content: --आननः, --आस्यः, --मुखः, --वक्त्रः {1} epithets of Śiva. {2} a lion (so called because its mouth is generally wide open; पंचं आननं यस्य), (often used at the end of names of learned men to express great learning or respect; न्याय°, तर्क° &c., {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} जगन्नाथतर्कपंचानन). {3} the sign Leo of the zodiac. (--नी an epithet of Durgā.
